attributes.additional_details:
The Spinal Injuries Centre at Pinderfields Hospital is under threat of being moved to Dewsbury. Yet Pinderfields has better motorway links than Dewsbury and includes £2,4million of charitable donations to provide OT and Physio services.

We want the Government to STOP this move as it doesn't consider the views of patients, current and past, or the needs of the citizens of Yorkshire & Humberside in the future.
